titleStmt.title: A brief discovery of the true causes, symptoms and effects, of that most reigning disease, the scurvy. Together with the causes, symptoms, and effects of several other dangerous diseases. : Whereunto is added, a short account of those incomparable and most highly approved pills, called pilulae in omnes morbos: or, pills against all diseases ... / Prepared and set forth for the publick benefit, by M. Bromfield, approved physician ...
titleStmt.author: Bromfield, M.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru/National Library of Wales.
